title: God's Marvelous Choice
itunes:title: God's Marvelous Choice
description: Today's Gospel present the distinction between a generic spirituality which emphasizes our decision for God, and authentic Christian Faith, which is the recognition that God has chosen us in Christ. It is God's choice, his election of us in Christ, as not only his followers, but his friends, that matters most.

It is God's choice, his election of us in Christ, as not only his followers, but his friends, that matters most.
